login.title: Sign in to %{title}
login.subtitle: We were waiting for you!

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Join the community!
success: Your account has been created successfully!

forgot.title: Recover your password
forgot.subtitle: If the account exists, we'll send you a code.
forgot.error: Password reset email was not sent.
success: A password reset email has been sent to your email address.
Your password has been reset successfully!
You can now sign in with your new password.

errors.min: Must be at least %{min} characters long
errors.max: Must be at most %{max} characters long
errors.minValue: Must be greater than or equal to %{min}
errors.maxValue: Must be less than or equal to %{max}
errors.email: Must be a valid email address
errors.oneOf: Only a value among %{values} is allowed
errors.permission-denied: You do not have the required permissions.

auth.email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use.
auth.user-disabled: The user account has been disabled.
auth.user-not-found: The user account does not exist.
auth.operation-not-allowed: This operation is not allowed. Please contact an admin.

storage.object-not-found: The requested file does not exist.
